oai_dc:dc.dc:title: RADIATION-INDUCED SOLID-STATE HOMOPOLYMERIZATION OF TRIOXANE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GHOSH, S
KUMAR, KS
PANDYA, MV
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The effects of irradiation dose, post polymerization time and compaction of the monomer on the polymer yield have been studied. The thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) and wide angle X-ray diffraction (XRD) analysis are carried out to determine the thermal stability and crystal structure of the polymer. Electron spin resonance (ESR) spectra have been used to determine the nature of the reactive species.
